replies.body: Ok just let me go get 40000 kills without dying

replies.body:
lol xD.. You know 1 death = 2 more kills (Not hard)

I need to state this more clearly its "PVP K/D"

replies.body: I don't think you understand how kd works, having a kd of 10, means you have to have 10 kills for every death, and for the people who have played a long time, it will be near impossible. However I only attempt these if they are challenging and have something to do with monuments.
replies.body_tagged: I don't think you understand how kd works, having a kd of 10, means you have to have 10 kills for every death, and for the people who have played a long time, it will be near impossible. However I only attempt these if they are challenging and have something to do with monuments.
